name: Flop Friction
description:
A short little froggy adventure game! Replay with multiple new frogs and have fun!

Your objective is to reach the end of the level!

Game design by https://lehanbotha.itch.io

Coding by https://tudordrobota.itch.io/

Art by https://desichan.itch.io/

Music & Sound Effects by https://nooisy.itch.io/ aka muda

Level Music https://austinlight.itch.io/
